data.author: Yuriy Galanter

changelog.release_notes: - added UTC military time
- improved display of longer street names of rect watches

- selectable location detail
- longer location names
- more precise name geolocation
- fixed problem with iPhone not getting weather
- restored manual location. This time by coords
- switched to foercast.io weather service
- this time really updated watch icons
- Updated watch icons
- fixed time "08:08" wrapping to another line
- From Pebble Health added Step Counter to PT, PTS and PTR
- more precise auto-geolocation (at actual town level)
- fixed problem with Yahoo geolocation for weather
- added military time option
- minor graphics updater for PT/OG

- fixed restart/recovery 
- updated graphics

- added support for languages supported by Pebble
- prep for PTR support

- Fixed "." not appearing in digital time
- Increased custom text size
- correctly disabled second tick in digital time

- added ability to hide BT icon
- added ability to display custom text in AM/PM slot
- minor color corrections

data.description:
Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

Flexible stylish watchface featuring date, battery info and weather. You can select between analog or digital main clock. Secondary info includes current location (city/town), local digital time or time from a different time zone. Color of the sidebar and second hand represent battery health - green, orange, red - or all the colors can be custom configured.

Other configurable options include:

- Step counter from Pebble Health
- Bluetooth disconnect alert in variable vibe strengths
- Separator between hours and minutes - dot or colon
- Temperature format - C or F
- Weather update interval
- Sidebar location (left/right)
- Custom colors 

You will need to get free key for weather services at https://developer.forecast.io - this is one time procedure.
data.title: Cobblestyle
